title: Stop Asking for 10 Years of Experience in a 2-Year-Old Tech

The Myth of the Perfect Code Review — Can We Stop Pretending It Exists?
Tech Interviews Are a Performance — Not Proof of Skill.

The Illusion of Work-Life Balance in Tech — Stop Selling Burnout as a Perk
content: The tech industry often promotes a work-life balance that is more illusion than reality, with many employees feeling pressured to work long hours.

title: The Problem with Buzzwords in Tech
content: Buzzwords can dilute the meaning of technical discussions and create confusion rather than clarity.

title: The Fallacy of the 'Rockstar' Developer
content: The idea of a 'rockstar' developer is misleading and can lead to unhealthy competition and burnout within teams.
